ctx: intros n l1 l2 H1 H2.

ctx: intros n l1 l2 H1 H2.
intros n l1 l2 H1 H2.

original: intros n l1 l2 H1 H2. apply all_permutations_aux_permutation in H2. apply H2 in H1. apply H1.
